model.text_generation

Class TextGeneration

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.text_generation.TextGeneration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PromptChooser, StorySegmentGenerator

    public abstract class TextGeneration
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for text generation

      Stores extracted information from user's input.

      Object which creates simplenlg structures
      protected simplenlg.realiser.english.Realiser realiser
      Object which transforms simplenlg structures into text
      protected int thresholdIncrement
      Used in defaultThreshold if all nouns are already above the defaultThreshold
